name: Class DocTreePathScanner<R,​P>
text:
A DocTreeVisitor that visits all the child tree nodes, and provides
 support for maintaining a path for the parent nodes.
 To visit nodes of a particular type, just override the
 corresponding visitorXYZ method.
 Inside your method, call super.visitXYZ to visit descendant
 nodes.
codes:
public class DocTreePathScanner<R, P>
extends DocTreeScanner<R, P>

methods.method_sig:
public R scan (DocTreePath path,
              P p)
methods.description: Scans a tree from a position identified by a tree path.

methods.method_sig:
public R scan (DocTree tree,
              P p)
methods.description:
Scans a single node.
 The current path is updated for the duration of the scan.

Returns the current path for the node, as built up by the currently
 active set of scan calls.
